string.name: login_forget_password_text
string.i: If you forget your password, you can create it again by pressing here.

resources.string: E-mail format is incorrect. Please check your e-mail.
Please enter your cipher with at least one digit and a letter, at least 8 characters in length.
Phone number format is incorrect. Please enter your phone number without leading zero and 10 digits in length.
Check that your email / GSM number is valid.
Please enter password which is sent to phone with number %1$s
Kartınızın arka yüzündeki 3 haneli CVV kodunu giriniz. Kartınızın CVV kodu yoksa, CVV kodu alanını boş bırakınız.
